meanings.definition: The person who presides over a meeting or organization.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, the chairperson made sure everyone had a chance to speak.
meanings.sent2: The chairperson of the club welcomed new members with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The chairperson accidentally sat on a squeaky chair, causing everyone to giggle.
meanings.sent4: As the chairperson of the chess club, she strategically moved the pieces to win the game.
meanings.sent5: The chairperson's authoritative voice echoed through the hall, commanding attention.

meanings.definition: To act as the chairperson of a committee or group.
meanings.sent1: She will chairperson the upcoming meeting to ensure it runs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: He chairpersons the board meetings with professionalism and efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The team decided to chairperson their lunch break to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent4: In the absence of the manager, she had to chairperson the staff meeting.
meanings.sent5: He will chairperson the event, making sure all details are taken care of.
